### [GitHub - ritwiktrivedi/ROE-Master-Snippets-File](https://github.com/ritwiktrivedi/ROE-Master-Snippets-File)

Contribute to ritwiktrivedi/ROE-Master-Snippets-File development by creating an account on GitHub. This is a repo some of us have been working on. It not complete but we are getting there. PRs are appreciated. Thanks to the course team for giving us this idea of having snippets for common operations. I am too sleepy to work on it now… So seriously… PRs are not only appreciated but needed. Just add the basic parsing code or image manipulation for ga5. I will try and add in the morning but who doesn’t like Good PRs? Also mentioning [@23f2005325](/u/23f2005325) (Aishik) here for his wonderful PR which I have now merged. hi, thanks to you and the other contributors for the effort

i have added llm week-3 codes through pull request. my code my not be perfect. but when I ran it in my laptop, it worked fine. pls do verify once before ROE ```markdown
## Image Description

The image displays a section of a version control interface, likely from a code management tool like Git. ### Features:
- **Title Bar**: 
  - "SOURCE CONTROL"
  - Contains various action buttons (e.g., Auto, icons for managing branches, etc.) - **Branch Visual Representation**:
  - Several interconnected lines and dots represent different branches and commits. - A highlighted path indicates the active branch labeled as "main." - **Commit Messages**: 
  - Several commit messages listed, including:
    - "Merge pull request #2 from de..."
    - "Added charcode code to get file encoding..."
    - "Rename README.txt to README_LLM.txt..."
    - "Added link to base64guru website..."
  
- **User Identifications**:
  - Names associated with commits, such as "Aishik Bandyopadhyay signing off". - **Miscellaneous**: 
  - References to pull requests and file additions. This interface mainly presents activities related to source control management, showcasing collaborative development efforts. ```

  
This looks beautiful Failure is part of life. My laptop hanged and despite having all the needed resources I panicked and the exam went the way it went. I take this as a lesson. This resource will be refined further. I thank everyone involved. I am glad that many benefitted and were actually able to score well.
